plot: Mr. Juicy Fun is coming to the grocery store to demonstrate his Fruit Obliterator, so Orange and the gang decide to cash in their frequent flier miles and get outta dodge. But when their pilot, Grandpa Lemon, falls asleep at the helm, Orange must take the controls and fly the fruit to safety. Will he stick the emergency landing, or will the fruit end up obliterated after all?—Jennifer Skelly
